articles.title: Education Commission Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Abusing Education for Confrontation
articles.content:
Education Commission Accuses S. Korean Authorities of Abusing Education for Confrontation 
						
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The spokesman for the Education Commission of the DPRK Friday made public a statement denouncing the south Korean authorities for defaming even the brilliant history of the DPRK and abusing noble education for the purpose of escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen and propping up their colonial fascist rule.
					 Some time ago the puppet Ministry of Education of south Korea took issue with the parts of history textbooks dealing with the DPRK to be used at high schools next year produced by various publishing houses of south Korea and pressurized them to unconditionally amend and supplement them. 
					
					 A scrutiny into what the conservative group is pressurizing their writers to include in those textbooks shows that it is the hostile and provocative parts falsifying historical facts and inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen including sentences slandering the land reform carried out in the DPRK, the Juche idea and socialist economy and shifting the responsibility for the warship Cheonan case and the Yonphyong Island shelling onto it. 
					
					 Their moves are another unpardonable political provocation against the DPRK and an intolerable insult and violation of noble education, the statement said, and went on: 
					
					 Education in history is an important work related to the rise and fall of the nation. 
					
					 Their denial of the objective historical facts and acts of trampling down through "witch hunt" schools where truth and justice should be taught bring to light the ulterior intention of the Park Geun Hye group to imbue the south Korean youngsters with hostility towards the DPRK and a reactionary outlook on history in a bid to render south Korean society more conservative and fascist and thus revive "yusin" dictatorship at any cost. 
					
					 History can never be changed by any distortion and coercion at the point of bayonet. 
					
					 The proud history of the DPRK will always remain shining in precious textbooks teaching genuine justice and truth to the people and posterity along with the country and nation. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet group will never escape a severe punishment by the nation as it falsifies the hard reality of history.

articles.title: Reception Given by Lao Ambassador
articles.content:
Reception Given by Lao Ambassador
						
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Kiettisak Keobanhdith, Lao ambassador to the DPRK, gave a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club on Friday on the occasion of the 38th anniversary of founding of the Lao People's Democratic Republic.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Cha Hui Rim, chairman of the Pyongyang City People's Committee who doubles as chairman of the Korea-Laos Friendship Association, Kim Sung Du, chairman of the Education Commission, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Kil Yon, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Kim Jin Bom, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and other officials concerned.
					
					 Present there were staff members of the Lao embassy.

articles.title: Exhibition of Scientific Research Successes Held
articles.content:
Exhibition of Scientific Research Successes Held
						
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- An exhibition of scientific research successes of the State Academy of Sciences was held from Dec. 3 to 6.
					 On display there were hundreds of successes made in the work to develop the country's science and technology and put the national economy on a Juche, modern and scientific basis.
					
					 Also on display were scientific and technological books and papers written and published by scientific research institutions and scientists.
					
					 The participants swapped experience gained in the course of scientific researches while the exhibition was under way.

articles.title: Munsu Recovery Center Opens
articles.content:
Munsu Recovery Center Opens
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The Munsu Recovery Center has been built on the picturesque bank of the River Taedong in Pyongyang. 
					 The center is a comprehensive treatment and service base with all facilities including modern medical equipment, rooms for nerve and heart function recovery treatment and all kinds of physical and surgical treatment and sick wards.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un who spares nothing for the people personally initiated the building of the modern recovery center and energetically led the whole course of the project.
					
					 Guiding a lot of layouts and designs, he worked heart and soul to build the center. When it was completed, he provided sets of equipment and apparatuses necessary for treatment and services ranging from best treatment equipment to buses with special functions. He clarified the issues arising in its management and operation.
					
					 True to his intention, soldier-builders have successfully completed the center in a mater of a little over five months.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony took place on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Mun Kyong Dok, officials concerned, soldier-builders, officials in the field of public health, employees of the center and other people in the city.

articles.title: Updated Hamhung Knitwear Factory Goes Operational
articles.content:
Updated Hamhung Knitwear Factory Goes Operational
						
 Hamhung, December 6 (KCNA) -- The Hamhung Knitwear Factory was updated.
					 Leader Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the factory on December 9, Juche 100 (2011). He showed such loving care as technologically updating the factory to produce quality knitwear and hosiery for the people in South Hamgyong Province.
					
					 True to his behest, the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea set forth tasks to be fulfilled by the factory to turn it into the one with high production capacity and took measures to hasten the project. 
					
					 Encouraged by the loving care and trust of the party and the leader, the employees of the factory and shock brigade members and officials from institutions and enterprises in the province have completed the project in a matter of a little over a year since they started it.
					
					 The updating of the factory helped lay another foundation for successfully carrying out the behests of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul to provide the people with quality vinalon knitwear.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony was held on Friday.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, employees of the factory, builders and helpers.
					
					 A letter of thanks of the Central Committee of the WPK to the builders and officials who performed labor feats in the project was conveyed at the ceremony.

articles.title: DPRK Students Prove Successful at Int'l Bayan and Accordion Concours
articles.content:
DPRK Students Prove Successful at Int'l Bayan and Accordion Concours 
						
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Students of the DPRK proved successful at the First Belyakov Cup International Bayan and Accordion Concours held in the capital of the Republic of Bashkortostan of Russia from November 30 to December 1. 
					 The concours brought together more than 120 teachers and students of art education institutions and artistes from different countries including the DPRK, Russia and Belarus. The concours, the first of its kind, was aimed at finding out the world's talented bayan and accordion players and widely disseminating folk music. 
					
					 Divided into eight groups according to ages, its participants competed in solo and ensemble. 
					
					 DPRK student Jon Yong Ju took the special place by successfully playing music pieces requiring high skill and artistry with bayan in bayan and accordion solo of the group of students. 
					
					 Yun Hyok In came first while Choe Hyok Chol finished second. 
					
					 Three students of the DPRK in bayan trio successfully presented the Korean song "Taehongdan of 3 000-ri" and famous foreign songs to prove the best of the 10 groups in ensemble and place first. 
					
					 The Korean students were awarded relevant diplomas at the closing ceremony held on Dec. 1. 
					
					 Belyakov, head of the jury of the concours, and Bayan Prof. Siroezhkin of the Music Academy Named after Gnesin and other music experts congratulated the Korean students on showcasing their high skills.

articles.title: University Graduate Volunteers to Teach Children on Islet
articles.content:
University Graduate Volunteers to Teach Children on Islet
						
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Jo Pom Hyang who graduated from Kim Hyong Jik University of Education volunteered to teach children on a forefront islet in the West Sea at a time when admirable traits of devoting oneself to the country and its people are displayed in the DPRK every day.
					 After finishing all her courses at the university with good results, she made up her mind to make her life as an educator worthwhile at a school on the islet far away from Pyongyang, her birthplace.
					
					 A farewell ceremony took place at the university on Thursday.
					
					 She extended profound thanks to Marshal Kim Jong Un who showed her such deep loving care as making sure that Kim Jong Il Youth Honor Prize was awarded to her in recognition of her admirable deed and renewed her resolution to dedicate herself to the education of children, always bearing in mind the benevolence of the Party and expectation of her Alma Mater.

articles.title: DPRK-made Painting Materials Highly Appreciated
articles.content:
DPRK-made Painting Materials Highly Appreciated
						
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Painting materials produced by the Korean Painting Materials Factory have been highly appreciated at home and abroad for their good quality.
					 They, made of natural materials, are characterized by fine harmony of colors and good quality in drawing Korean paintings, oil paintings and posters, thus ensuring lifelike art pieces. 
					
					 They proved safe from decoloration and strong in resisting sunlight.
					
					 The painting materials, clear-cut in colors and good in coloration, are mainly divided into three kinds, professional, educational and decorative.
					
					 The Mansudae Art Studio and other major art studios in the DPRK have created with the painting materials of 30 colors a large number of art works. Some of them were listed as national treasures.
					
					 Jong Su Nam, chief engineer of the factory, told KCNA that the painting materials of "Paekho" trademark have been well received not only by local artists but by others in Asian and European countries.

articles.title: Coal Output Goes Up in DPRK
articles.content:
Coal Output Goes Up in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- All the employees of the February 8 Jikdong Youth Coal Mine in the DPRK have turned out in the efforts to increase the coal production, determined to implement the behests of leader Kim Jong Il to the letter.
					 In August Juche 98 (2009) Kim Jong Il visited the mine, which takes a big share in the country's coal production.
					
					 Its manager Pho Hwi Song told KCNA:
					
					 During his visit to the coal mine, leader Kim Jong Il expressed great satisfaction over its efforts for technical improvement and modernization as well as drastically increased production. And he set forth the tasks to be carried out by the mine.
					
					 Keeping his sunny smile in their mind, the employees of the mine are now overfulfilling their daily coal production plan while giving precedence to tunneling to provide enough reserve cutting faces.
					
					 Coal miners of Pits 5, 8, 9 and 12 take the lead in this increased production drive, mining several hundred tonnes of coal more than their daily plan. The Youth Pit and other pits are also fulfilling the daily production plan at 130 percent.
					
					 Meanwhile, the coal mine is pressing ahead with a project for turning it into a leading coal producer of the country.

articles.title: Lot of Works on Juche-oriented and Popular Architecture Authored by Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Lot of Works on Juche-oriented and Popular Architecture Authored by Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il 
						
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il authored works which comprehensively deal with the Juche-oriented and popular ideas and theories  on architecture in each period and at each stage of the nation-building.
					 Kim Il Sung authored various works after the liberation of the country, putting an end to the history of all sorts of outdated and unpopular architecture in the preceding era and clarifying ideas and theories on the Juche-based architecture, the socialist architecture centering on the popular masses in which the Juche idea is embodied.
					
					 Confident of the future of the triumphant country in the crucible of the Fatherland Liberation War, he published the work "On Mapping Out the Master Plan for the Postwar Reconstruction of Pyongyang," unrolling a grand blueprint for rehabilitation and construction.
					
					 The works published by him in the difficult period of the postwar rehabilitation and construction comprehensively clarified the principles and ways to be firmly adhered to in creating and developing socialist architecture.
					
					 He clarified the principled issues arising in creating architecture in each annals of socialist construction.
					
					 Kim Jong Il published the work "Theory of Architectural Art" on May 21, Juche 80 (1991), giving an exposition of the issues of the essence of architecture and its attribute, the revolutionary nature of the socialist architecture and Juche-based architecture and its characteristics.
					
					 In different works he put forward the original idea on creating architecture based on the revolutionary outlook on the leader. He clarified principled issues and ways to develop socialist architecture in the DPRK into a Juche-based and popular new architecture to meet the requirements of the developing era and the aesthetic and emotional taste of the people.
					
					 The above-said works are powerfully arousing all service personnel and people to the struggle for building a thriving nation with their great attraction and vitality.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Feats on National Reunification
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on Kim Jong Il's Feats on National Reunification
						
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The lifelong efforts made by leader Kim Jong Il for the country's reunification and great national unity and the feats he performed in carrying out the sacred cause of independent reunification are shedding their rays forever in the history of the country, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il published famous works to formulate the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme for great national unity and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo as the three charters for national reunification and made sure that the idea and line of President Kim Il Sung on national reunification display the eternal vitality in the reunification movement.
					
					 He provided the north-south summit for the first time in the history of division and saw to it that the June 15 joint declaration the basic spirit of which is the idea of "By our nation itself" was adopted.
					
					 Another historic north-south summit was held and the October 4 declaration, the programme for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, was adopted amid the dynamic advance of the era of the independent reunification, paving a wide avenue for the development of the north-south relations, peace and prosperity.
					
					 Under the banner of Songun put up by the Workers' Party of Korea the DPRK leaped to the center stage of the world as a country manufacturing and launching satellites and a nuclear weapons state. Gone are the days never to return when the imperialists threatened the DPRK with nuclear weapons. Korean people from all walks of life in the north and the south and abroad, feeling the national pride and self-esteem in the great vitality of the Songun politics, have made a nationwide march for national unity and reunification, positively supporting the DPRK's just line and policy for national reunification.
					
					 It was thanks to the wise guidance and total devotion of Kim Jong Il that the cause of independent reunification could triumphantly advance despite all ordeals and storms of history.

articles.title: S. Korea Degenerating into Hodgepodge of Foreign Languages
articles.content:
S. Korea Degenerating into Hodgepodge of Foreign Languages
						
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., on Nov. 28 carried an article contributed by a Korean in the U.S. deploring south Korea flooded with Yankee culture.
					 It said: Koreans are a homogeneous nation which has lived with the same language and culture on the same land from the olden times.    But south Korea has been contaminated with such foreign medley culture for nearly 70 years since the U.S. forces' presence in south Korea that it is hard to find its original appearance.
					
					 What broadcasting services are airing is not the Korean language. The same can be said of newspapers and other publications. Newspaper articles are full of English expressions. The number of foreign words used by daily newspapers in Seoul on a daily average is more than 800 and more than 50 percent of the titles of broadcasting programs are given in foreign words.
					
					 The results of survey and analysis of more than 1 600 daily vocabularies used in the south showed that 95 percent of them are medley foreign words. Signboards in Seoul are no exception.
					
					 Medley words mixed with foreign phraseologies are mainly used in politics. Such phenomena are attributable to the lack of the awareness of the national identity.
					
					 Looking back on the "president's" demeanors during her foreign trips, they just make people "feel disillusioned" and "hurt their self-esteem".
					
					 In order to put an end to American-style culture it is necessary to reunify the country.

articles.title: Repeal of SL Called for in S. Korea
articles.content:
Repeal of SL Called for in S. Korea
						
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet newspaper Voice of People posted an article demanding the abrogation of the "Security Law" (SL) on Dec. 2.
					 65 years have passed since the evil law was fabricated, the article said, adding:
					
					 The SL is a copy of the "Maintenance of the Public Order Act", a tool for suppressing the independence movement in the period of the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule over Korea, and the one which was retrogressively revised to include even clauses of the "Anti-communist Law" of the Chun Doo Hwan military fascist regime. It has been invoked to indiscriminately crack down on the movements for democracy and national reunification in south Korea.
					
					 This law is still applied for suppressing progressive personages. A typical example of this is the fact that the prosecution is working hard to suppress a father of the Jonju Parish Priests Group of the south Korean Catholic Priests' Council for Justice on charge of violation of the SL for the mere reason that he urged the present regime which seized power through fraudulent election to step down.
					
					  It is a shame, indeed, that the SL remains in force, the article stressed.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Forces Urged to Step Down
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Forces Urged to Step Down
						
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The Chondoist Joint Measure Committee for Denouncing Illegal Interference in Presidential Election and Deterioration of People's Living in south Korea made public a declaration on the situation on Dec. 3 in demand of the resignation of the puppet ruling forces. The Committee groups the Tonghak Society for National Reunification, the Chondoist Youth Association and other organizations.
					 The declaration said that the "government" is paying lip service to the improved people's living but pursuing a policy for big businesses, pushing common people's living to a cliff.
					
					 Economic democracy and well-being called for by the present ruling forces during the election campaign have disappeared, it deplored, accusing them of reducing the bosses of power bodies to their yes men to cause the irregularities and inequality to fester.
					
					 Noting that Park Geun Hye who cried out for "clear election" whenever a chance presented itself is describing the religionists' call for her resignation as "confusion and division", it went on:
					
					 The "president" should make a responsible decision as regards illegal interference in the election by the Intelligence Service and other power bodies and deterioration of people's living.
					
					 Special inspection should be made to probe the truth about the fraudulent election and punish the prime mover.
					
					 The "government" should pay heed to the religionists' criticism made for the sake of the weak in society and justice and stop at once the reckless racket for eliminating the "forces following the north."

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Commemorated in Bangladesh, Ethiopia
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Demise Commemorated in Bangladesh, Ethiopia
						
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- A seminar, round-table talks, a photo exhibition and film show took place in Bangladesh and Ethiopia between November 20 and 28 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 Displayed in the photo exhibition were photos documenting immortal exploits of President Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il and supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were photos showing the Korean people's struggle for building a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Speakers including the chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy praised Kim Jong Il for wisely leading the Korean people's struggle for the building of a thriving nation and national reunification by pursuing original Songun politics and performing great exploits in carrying out the human cause of independence.
					
					 The manager of the Water Projects Designing and Supervision Enterprise of Ethiopia said that they would always remember Kim Jong Il, who extended material and moral support to African countries including Ethiopia.
					
					 Speakers including its deputy manager noted the round-table talks offered an opportunity to once again realize Kim Jong Il's demise was a great loss not only to the Korean people but to peoples of African countries.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Tunisia
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il to Be Remembered in Tunisia
						
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- A Tunisian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il was formed in Tunis on November 28.
					 Muhammad Al Habib Al Juraidi, member of the Executive Committee of the Tunisia-Korea Friendship Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to hold diverse political and cultural events for praising the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Il on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il Lauded by Brazilian Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Lauded by Brazilian Figure
 Pyongyang, December 6 (KCNA) -- The chairman of the Brazilian committee for remembering leader Kim Jong Il issued a statement on November 27 on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of his demise.
					 He said that Kim Jong Il performed immortal exploits in carrying out the human cause of independence, possessed of matchlessly outstanding idea and leadership ability. He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il smashed the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK by pursuing the original Songun politics and firmly defended socialism in the DPRK and peace and security of the world.
					
					 The Korean people have remarkably bolstered up the capability for self-defence and had access to powerful nuclear deterrence under the banner of Songun.
					
					 Kim Jong Il channeled great efforts into the development of relations with the  countries desirous of independence and put strong spurs to the global cause of independence through energetic external activities for building a new world guided by the idea of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 He was a great man who made a distinguished contribution to carrying out the cause of independence against imperialism.
					
					 His exploits performed in the global cause of independence will always be remembered by progressive mankind.

articles.title: Comite de Educacion publica nota denunciando a autoridades surcoreanas
articles.content:
Comite de Educacion publica nota denunciando a autoridades surcoreanas 
						
Pyongyang, 6 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite de Educacion de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea hizo publica el dia 6 una declaracion denunciando a los titeres surcoreanos que malemplean la brillante historia de la RPDC y las sagradas labores docentes en su campana de confrontacion fratricida y el mantenimiento de la dominacion fascista colonial. 
					Hace poco, el Ministerio de Educacion del Sur de Corea cuestiono el contenido referente a la RPDC de los manuales de historia a ser usados el ano proximo en las escuelas superiores y obligo a las casas editoriales modificarlos incondicionalmente. 
					
					Los parrafos, que los titeres conservadores obligan a insertar en esos manuales, tienen el caracter hostil y desafiante a la RPDC y tergiversan los hechos historicos fomentando la confrontacion fratricida. 
					
					Por ejemplo, calumnian la reforma agraria realizada en la RPDC, la idea Juche y la economia socialista e imputan a ella la culpabilidad del caso de hundimiento de la corbeta "Cheonan" y del incidente de fuego artillero en la isla Yonphyong. 
					
					Esta imperdonable provocacion politica  a la RPDC constituye un insulto y violacion de la sagrada labor docente. 
					
					La educacion de la historia es una cuestion importante que decide la prosperidad o la decadencia de la nacion. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos niegan los objetivos datos historicos y malemplean hasta la educacion, que tiene la mision de ensenar la verdad y la justicia, como escenario de la caza de brujas.
					
					De esta manera, se ha revelado la malsana intencion de la banda de Park Geun-hye de inyectar en los jovenes y escolares surcoreanos la hostilidad anti-RPDC y la reaccionaria concepcion de la historia, convertir la sociedad surcoreana en la mas conservadora y fascista y resucitar a toda costa la dictadura de "Yusin". 
					
					La historia no se cambia aunque alguien la tergiverse o imponga el cambio con la fuerza. 
					
					La historia orgullosa de la RPDC brillara eternamente junto con la patria y la nacion como valioso manual que ensena la justicia y la verdad a los habitantes y generaciones venideras. 
					
					Los titeres surcoreanos, que distorsionan los hechos de la historia, seran condenados severamente por la nacion coreana.

articles.title: Exposicion de exitos cientificos de Academia Estatal de Ciencias
articles.content:
Exposicion de exitos cientificos de Academia Estatal de Ciencias 
						
Pyongyang, 6 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar del dia 3 al 6 de este mes la exposicion de exitos de investigacion cientifica de la Academia Estatal de Ciencias. 
					En la ocasion se presentaron cientos de exitos logrados en el desarrollo de las ciencias y tecnicas del pais y en la realizacion de la jucheanizacion, la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de la economia nacional. 
					
					Tambien figuraban los libros cientifico-tecnicos y disertaciones escritos por los organos de investigacion y cientificos. 
					
					En el periodo del certamen se intercambiaron las experiencias adquiridas en la investigacion.

articles.title: Inaugurado Centro de Recuperacion de Munsu
articles.content:
Inaugurado Centro de Recuperacion de Munsu
						
Pyongyang, 6 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Se construyo a la ribera del pintoresco rio Taedong el Centro de Recuperacion de Munsu, base combinada de servicio medico dotada de modernas instalaciones y salas de recuperacion de la funcion de nervio y corazon, de tratamiento fisico y quirurgico de distintos generos, habitaciones de hospital y otras condiciones necesarias.
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un tuvo la iniciativa de la construccion del moderno centro de recuperacion y dirigio todo el proceso de la obra.
					
					Vio numerosos proyectos de conformacion y disenos y despues de terminada la obra ofrecio los equipos modernos necesarios al servicio medico y el autobus dotado de la funcion especial e ilumino los asuntos que se presentan en la administracion.
					
					En pleno acato al proposito del Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea los constructores militares lo construyeron  magnificamente en casi 5 meses.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 6 el acto inaugural con la participacion de Pak Pong Ju, Choe Thae Bok, Yang Hyong Sop, Mun Kyong Dok, funcionarios de sector de salud publica, constructores militares, funcionarios y empleados de dicho centro junto con trabajadores capitalinos.

articles.title: Terminada la obra de modernizacion de Fabrica de Generos de Punto de Hamhung
articles.content:
Terminada la obra de modernizacion de Fabrica de Generos de Punto de Hamhung
						
Pyongyang, 6 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Quedo terminada la obra de modernizacion de la Fabrica de Generos de Punto de Hamhung. 
					El 9 de diciembre del 100 (2011) de la Era Juche, el Dirigente Kim Jong Il visito la fabrica y dio la indicacion de remodelarla para producir los vestidos de punto y medias de buena calidad y suministrarlos a los habitantes de la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur.
					
					Partiendo de ese legado, el Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea presento la tarea de remodelar la fabrica aumentando su capacidad de produccion y tomo medidas para cumplirla cuanto antes.
					
					Estimulados por la confianza del partido y el lider, los empleados y miembros de la brigada de construccion y los funcionarios de los organos y empresas de dicha provincia terminaron la obra en poco mas de un ano.
					
					Gracias a la modernizacion, se ha preparado otra base para materializar los legados de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il quienes hicieron ingentes esfuerzos por ofrecer al pueblo coreano los tejidos de punto de vinalon de buena calidad. 
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 6 la ceremonia de inauguracion con la participacion de los funcionarios correspondientes, los empleados de la fabrica, los constructores y los ayudantes a la obra. 
					
					En la ocasion fue leido el mensaje de agradecimiento del Comite Central del PTC enviado a los constructores y funcionarios que realizaron meritos de trabajo en la obra.

articles.title: Estudiantes de RPDC sobresalen en concurso internacional
articles.content:
Estudiantes de RPDC sobresalen en concurso internacional
Pyongyang, 6 de diciembre (ACNC) -- Los alumnos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sobresalieron en el primer concurso internacional de acordeon cromatico y acordeon por la copa Belyakov, efectuado desde el 30 de noviembre hasta el primero de este mes en la capital de la Republica de Bashkortostan de Rusia.
					El concurso tiene el objetivo de buscar a los talentosos tocadores de esos instrumentos musicales y divulgar ampliamente las musicas nacionales.
					
					En la ocasion participaron mas de 120 profesores, estudiantes y artistas de los organos de educacion de arte de varios paises como la RPDC, Rusia, Belarus, etc.
					
					El concurso se realizo en 8 categorias por edades y el ranking se decidio segun la calidad de interpretacion sola y el ensamblaje.
					
					Jon Yong Ju, quien concurso en la interpretacion sola de la categoria de estudiantes, ocupo lugar especial al manejar excelentemente el acordeon cromatico en las piezas musicales que exigen gran habilidad artistica.
					
					Sus compatriotas Yun Hyok In y Choe Hyok Chol se ubicaron en el primer y segundo lugares, respectivamente.
					
					El trio coreano de acordeon cromatico interpreto magnificamente la cancion coreana "Tres mil ries de Taehongdan" y las musicas extranjeras famosas y ocuparon primer lugar obteniendo la mejor evaluacion entre 10 grupos rivales en la categoria de ensamblaje.
					
					En la ceremonia de clausura celebrada el dia primero, se otorgaron los diplomas correspondientes a los estudiantes coreanos.
					
					El presidente del jurado, el profesor de acordeon cromatico de la Academia de Musica Belyakov y Gnesin, Siroezhkin, y otros especialistas felicitaron a los estudiantes coreanos diciendo que ellos demostraron su gran habilidad.
